name: The Ne'er-do-well's Guild
description:
Congratulations on your initiation to The Ne'er-do-well's Guild. 

Recruit new members and identify fellow members to raise your status and rank in the guild. 

Guild members can identify themselves to other members with a circle drawn on the palm (traditionally, the left but the right is acceptable in most jurisdictions.) Alternatively, drawing a circle on one's palm with the index finger of the opposite hand is also recognized as a greeting.

The Ne'er-do-well's guild was founded on the tenent that we are the waves carrying the sands and dusts around the world. Move about, spread the word. Objects need to be moved to find their places as humans do. To that end, members exchange a curio or bauble from one's pocket when greeting a fellow guildmember. In this way, we see that the objects that need to move around the world find their way.

Magna effectus parva motus
Great effects through small movements
